title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: From the amazing BTC artist Cryptograffiti, comes one of their less traditional pieces."BTC vs FED" was an art installation that Cryptograffiti did in the 12 US Federal Reserve cities.This is phase two of the "United Nodes of Bitcoin" project.Here's a short interview he did about it: https://www.nasdaq.com/articles/interview%3A-cryptograffiti-on-bitcoin-vs.-the-fed-2021-01-19After the installations were done, Cryptograffiti took the billboards and turned them in usable bags...Specifially 50x duffle bags, 50x backpacks, and 50x tote bags.Each one numbered and unique as he used different parts of different billboards to make the bags.And also each billboard had a different saying on it, making it an even more of a unique pattern.You can see how each one looked on their respective pages:Duffle: https://cryptograffiti.com/collections/duffleBackpacks: https://cryptograffiti.com/collections/backpackTote: https://cryptograffiti.com/collections/tote*Each item was unbagged once for photographs and then sealed back upSTARTING BID: 0.000BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 3 decimal places**END TIME: MAY 30th, 2022, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: 0.015....... these are great.. sad i missed out on the mini billboards on scarce city. Next thing better would be owning the billboards themselves

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptogreatdane on May 27, 2022, 01:31:30 AM.023WinnerThank you for the bids
